subject: Deaths (Obituaries)
Basketball
lead_paragraph: Ray Mears was the Tennessee basketball coach who during 15 seasons with the Volunteers guided the future N.B.A. players Ernie Grunfeld and Bernard King.
snippet: Ray Mears was the Tennessee basketball coach who during 15 seasons with the Volunteers guided the future N.B.A. players Ernie Grunfeld and Bernard King.
